verses.verse: Then the Lord<WH3068> said<WH559> to Noah,<WH5146> "Enter<WH935> the ark,<WH8392> you and all<WH3605> your household;<WH1004> for you [alone] I have seen<WH7200> [to be] righteous<WH6662> before<WH6440> Me in this<WH2088> time.<WH1755>

"You shall take<WH3947> with you of every<WH3605> clean<WH2889> animal<WH929> by sevens,<WH7651> a male<WH376> and his female;<WH802> and of the animals<WH929> that are not clean<WH2889> two,<WH8147> a male<WH376> and his female;<WH802>

also<WH1571> of the birds<WH5775> of the sky,<WH8064> by sevens,<WH7651> male<WH2145> and female,<WH5347> to keep<WH2421> offspring<WH2233> alive<WH2421> on the face<WH6440> of all<WH3605> the earth.<WH776>

"For after seven<WH7651> more<WH5750> days,<WH3117> I will send<WH4305> rain<WH4305> on the earth<WH776> forty<WH705> days<WH3117> and forty<WH705> nights;<WH3915> and I will blot<WH4229> out from the face<WH6440> of the land<WH127> every<WH3605> living<WH3351> thing<WH3351> that I have made.<WH6213>"
And Noah<WH5146> did<WH6213> according to all<WH3605> that the Lord<WH3068> had commanded<WH6680> him.
Now Noah<WH5146> was six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> when the flood<WH3999> of water<WH4325> came<WH1961> upon the earth.<WH776>
Then Noah<WH5146> and his sons<WH1121> and his wife<WH802> and his sons' wives<WH802> with him entered<WH935> the ark<WH8392> because<WH4480> <WH6440> of the water<WH4325> of the flood.<WH3999>
Of clean<WH2889> animals<WH929> and animals<WH929> that are not clean<WH2889> and birds<WH5775> and everything<WH3605> that creeps<WH7430> on the ground,<WH127>
there went<WH935> into the ark<WH8392> to Noah<WH5146> by twos,<WH8147> male<WH2145> and female,<WH5347> as God<WH430> had commanded<WH6680> Noah.<WH5146>
And it came<WH1961> about after the seven<WH7651> days,<WH3117> that the water<WH4325> of the flood<WH3999> came<WH1961> upon the earth.<WH776>

In the six<WH8337> hundredth<WH3967> year<WH8141> of Noah's life,<WH9132> in the second<WH8145> month,<WH2320> on the seventeenth<WH7651> <WH6240> day<WH3117> of the month,<WH2320> on the same<WH2088> day<WH3117> all<WH3605> the fountains<WH4599> of the great<WH7227> deep<WH8415> burst<WH1234> open,<WH1234> and the floodgates<WH699> of the sky<WH8064> were opened.<WH6605>
And the rain<WH1653> fell<WH1961> upon the earth<WH776> for forty<WH705> days<WH3117> and forty<WH705> nights.<WH3915>

On the very<WH6106> same<WH6106> day<WH3117> Noah<WH5146> and Shem<WH8035> and Ham<WH2526> and Japheth,<WH3315> the sons<WH1121> of Noah,<WH5146> and Noah's wife<WH802> and the three<WH7969> wives<WH802> of his sons<WH1121> with them, entered<WH935> the ark,<WH8392>

they and every<WH3605> beast<WH9130> after its kind,<WH4327> and all<WH3605> the cattle<WH929> after their kind,<WH4327> and every<WH3605> creeping<WH7431> thing<WH7431> that creeps<WH7430> on the earth<WH776> after its kind,<WH4327> and every<WH3605> bird<WH5775> after its kind,<WH4327> all<WH3605> sorts<WH3671> of birds.<WH6833>
So they went<WH935> into the ark<WH8392> to Noah,<WH5146> by twos<WH8147> of all<WH3605> flesh<WH1320> in which<WH834> was the breath<WH7307> of life.<WH9132>

And those that entered,<WH935> male<WH2145> and female<WH5347> of all<WH3605> flesh,<WH1320> entered<WH935> as God<WH430> had commanded<WH6680> him; and the Lord<WH3068> closed<WH5462> [it] behind<WH1157> him.

Then the flood<WH3999> came<WH1961> upon the earth<WH776> for forty<WH705> days;<WH3117> and the water<WH4325> increased<WH7235> and lifted<WH5375> up the ark,<WH8392> so that it rose<WH7311> above<WH4480> <WH5921> the earth.<WH776>
And the water<WH4325> prevailed<WH1396> and increased<WH7235> greatly<WH3966> upon the earth;<WH776> and the ark<WH8392> floated<WH1980> on the surface<WH6440> of the water.<WH4325>

And the water<WH4325> prevailed<WH1396> more<WH3966> and more<WH3966> upon the earth,<WH776> so that all<WH3605> the high<WH1364> mountains<WH2022> everywhere<WH3605> under<WH8478> the heavens<WH8064> were covered.<WH3680>
The water<WH4325> prevailed<WH1396> fifteen<WH2568> <WH6240> cubits<WH520> higher,<WH4605> and the mountains<WH2022> were covered.<WH3680>

And all<WH3605> flesh<WH1320> that moved<WH7430> on the earth<WH776> perished,<WH1478> birds<WH5775> and cattle<WH929> and beasts<WH9130> and every<WH3605> swarming<WH8318> thing<WH8318> that swarms<WH8317> upon the earth,<WH776> and all<WH3605> mankind;<WH120>
of all<WH3605> that was on the dry<WH2724> land,<WH2724> all<WH3605> in whose<WH834> nostrils<WH639> was the breath<WH5397> of the spirit<WH7307> of life,<WH9132> died.<WH4191>

Thus He blotted<WH4229> out every<WH3605> living<WH3351> thing<WH3351> that was upon the face<WH6440> of the land,<WH127> from man<WH120> to animals<WH929> to creeping<WH7431> things<WH7431> and to birds<WH5775> of the sky,<WH8064> and they were blotted<WH4229> out from the earth;<WH776> and only<WH389> Noah<WH5146> was left,<WH7604> together with those that were with him in the ark.<WH8392>
And the water<WH4325> prevailed<WH1396> upon the earth<WH776> one hundred<WH3967> and fifty<WH2572> days.<WH3117>
